oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Envelope from the headquarters of the Grand Army of the Republic
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Envelope from the Headquarters of the Grand Army of the Republic (GAR) addressed to "Comrade James George, H. Ellsworth Post, No. 32, GAR, Jamestown, Fentress County, Tennessee."A note on the front of the envelope in pencil reads "Refers to the Portland Encampment." A note on the back reads in pencil "Robert Wright Fort Smith, Arkansas."
